data.Title: Google Core Update Expected in Coming Weeks
data.Description: Google has announced that the next core update is expected to roll out in the coming weeks.

data.Title: Google Discover May Offer Content Exclusion for Publishers
data.Description: Google may give publishers a way to exclude some of their content from Google Discover in the future.

data.Title: Google Search Testing New UI Features
data.Description: Google Search is testing highlighting words in blue in the search results and using light background colors as well. Additionally, they are testing a "back to AI Overview" button after users scroll past the AI Overview.

data.Title: Google Business Profiles Chat Feature Discontinued
data.Description: Google Business Profiles chat feature no longer lets you start new chats. Users are advised to download their chat history.

data.Title: Google May Use Site-Level AI Content Score
data.Description: Google may have a site-level AGC (artificially generated content) classification score.

data.Title: Google's Handling of JavaScript-Heavy Sites for SEO
data.Description: Google renders all webpages, including JavaScript-heavy sites, for search indexing. This was discussed in a Search Off the Record podcast with Zoe Clifford, John Mueller, and Martin Splitt.

data.Title: Google's Discover Feed Lacks Content Blocking Options
data.Description: Google confirms no option to block content from Discover, unlike News, highlighting limitations in crawling control.

data.Title: Understanding Google's Disavow Tool in 2024
data.Description: There's one possible reason to disavow inbound links in circa 2024.

data.Title: Google's Stance on Large Disavow Lists
data.Description: John Mueller from Google says that you should not worry about having massive link disavow lists or removing them, stating that the impact is "zero."

data.Title: Schema.org Gets a Fresh New Look
data.Description: Schema.org has undergone a design refresh, with both the main site and validator sporting a new look.

data.Title: The Importance of Bing's Index in the Age of AI
data.Description: Bing's index is becoming increasingly important for SEO as it now powers ChatGPT, and soon Apple's Siri, Meta AI, LinkedIn AI, and Microsoft Copilot.

data.Title: Google's AI Overviews: Selection and Linking to Sources
data.Description: Rich Sanger SEO and Ryan Jones discuss how Google's AI Overview selects and links to sources, highlighting the potential impact on content ranking.

data.Title: COPIED Act Aims to Protect Content from AI Use
data.Description: The "Content Origin Protection and Integrity from Edited and Deepfaked Media Act" seeks to protect artists and journalists' content from unauthorized AI use.

data.Title: OpenAI's 'Strawberry' Project: Enhancing AI Reasoning
data.Description: OpenAI is working on a project code-named 'Strawberry', aiming to improve AI model reasoning capabilities for autonomous internet navigation and research.
